div.p:
At last some of my mail has
caught up with me. That was the cutest
card. All of the girls got a big kick out
of it. My Lt. laughted until she cried. There are
10 of us girls working together as cadre for
Co. 5 + yesterday morning we didn't have to get
up except to be at breakfast at 7 and the
night before one of the girls was sick +
we were up with her until we could get an
ambulance + send her to the hospital and
didn't any of us wake up the next morning
so therefore we went without breakfast.
I sure like it here + I like the work so much
better. Lots of fun. We will just have the
new recruits two days and send them on
over to South Post. We take them to
get their shots, clothes, show them how to
make beds, salute, stand at attention.
In other words we get to raise H--L with
them first + make them do the dirty work
in the barracks.
(over)

Some take it swell. Others cry. Some cuss
a little but we just laugh at them and
we are all acting corporals + will have our
stripes next week but won't get any increase
in pay for a while. Some kind of a
mix up. I don't know just what.
This is Saturday night but someone
had to stay as C.Q. (charge of quarters)
so I said I would as I didn't have
anything special to do. Three of the
kids went to Chattanooga Tenn + saw
a show + came back. Said they didn't
want me to be by myself. So we are all
writing letters. I made my check on all
of the barracks. I mean the four that
we have + the supply house. So now I
am through for the night except keep
ing the fires. You would get a big kick
if you could see our quarters. Our part
is an old CCC Camp. Stove heat and baths
+ toilet in a building back of our sleeping
quarters. But they are fixing it up + it is
going to be nice. Say Oh! Boy is it nice
here. Little chilly here today but it
has been swell. Nice + warm.

-3
How are the boys + what are they doing?
I sure would like to see them. Every
time Louis writes he asks about them.
He is still in New Mexico. How is G.W. ?
I had a letter from Mike. Said he saw
G.W. and he sent me the clipping out
of the paper and Mr. Kirk sent me the
paper. Mrs. Stella sent me the cutest
valentine. Joe has his Corporal's stripes.
I would have sent the kids some valentines
but couldn't buy any on the post + I
didn't get to go to wotn. When have
you see Al? I have never got his
address.
I am sending you the key to my
suitcase. Open it and take out your
picture + the boys. Get me another
folder for your + GW's picture + send
them to me by return mail. There is
a pair of stockings in there that I wore
You can take them out + have them clean

if you want them. But don't use my
other ones. I'm not going to ever make
plans to come home again. I'll just
wait + when I get a chance I'll come.
I'll tell you this + so help me it is
the truth. I am perfectly happy
+ satisfied. I have gained 5 1/2 lbs but
have lost my beer tummy.
How is my shadow and why don't she
write? I'll be kicking her teeth in one
of these days. What is the matter with
Norma? She has never written to me.
Some of these Sundays when you feel
good how about making me a cake.
Apple sauce. I mean. I bet we sure
would enjoy it.
Well kids guess I had better quit
scribbling + call it a day for I think
I have done quite well. Don't you
think so? Tell Boehn he is going to
catch h..l + I don't mean maybe.
div.closer:
Love to you all. Big hug + kiss for
Jimmy + Jerry
